trans-unit.source: Represents the base class from which all implementations of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm inherit.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 算法的所有实现均从中继承的基类。

trans-unit.source: Extending this class proves that you are implementing an `RSA` key.
trans-unit.target: 扩展此类证明你要实施`RSA`密钥。

trans-unit.source: This is required for any developer providing a new `RSA` key implementation.
trans-unit.target: 这是必需的任何开发人员提供一个新的`RSA`密钥实现。

trans-unit.source: The only purpose of this class is as a hierarchy member for identification of the `RSA` algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 此类的唯一用途是作为层次结构成员的标识的`RSA`算法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> supports key lengths from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider，则 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> 支持长度为 384 位至 16384 位（增量为 8 位）的密钥。

trans-unit.source: It supports key lengths from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了 Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider，则它支持长度为 384 位至 512 位（增量为 8 位）的密钥。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This is a protected method that can only be called from a class derived from <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>.
trans-unit.target: 这是仅从派生自类中调用的受保护的方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 无法创建抽象类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Allows specific implementations of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> to be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 允许实例化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 的特定实现。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the default implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 算法的默认实现的实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the default implementation of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 的默认实现的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The key size, in bits.
trans-unit.target: 密钥大小（以位为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new ephemeral RSA key with the specified key size.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有指定密钥大小的新临时 RSA 密钥。

trans-unit.source: A new ephemeral RSA key with the specified key size.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定密钥大小的新临时 RSA 密钥。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> is different than <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeySize" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> 与 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeySize" /> 不同。

trans-unit.source: The parameters for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 算法的参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new ephemeral RSA key with the specified RSA key parameters.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有指定 RSA 密钥参数的新临时 RSA 密钥。

trans-unit.source: A new ephemeral RSA key.
trans-unit.target: 新的临时 RSA 密钥。

trans-unit.source: The name of the implementation of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 的实现的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified implementation of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 的指定实现的实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified implementation of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 的指定实现的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The data to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 要解密的数据。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填充模式。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, decrypts the input data using the specified padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中被重写时，使用指定的填充模式来解密输入数据。

trans-unit.source: The decrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 已解密的数据。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 派生方法必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The cipher text to be decrypted.
trans-unit.target: 要解密的密码文本。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, decrypts the input data using the private key.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用私钥解密输入数据。

trans-unit.source: The resulting decryption of the <paramref name="rgb" /> parameter in plain text.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgb" /> 参数产生的纯文本形式的解密结果。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this method was `abstract`.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]和.NET framework 的早期版本，此方法已`abstract`。

trans-unit.source: However, the only implementation by a derived class, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.DecryptValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, also threw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 但是，唯一的派生类，实现<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.DecryptValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，还引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>异常。

trans-unit.source: This method call is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此方法调用。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] 开始引发了此异常。

trans-unit.source: The data to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 要加密的数据。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填充模式。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, encrypts the input data using the specified padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中被重写时，使用指定的填充模式加密输入数据。

trans-unit.source: The encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 已加密的数据。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 派生方法必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The plain text to be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 要加密的纯文本。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, encrypts the input data using the public key.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用公钥加密输入数据。

trans-unit.source: The resulting encryption of the <paramref name="rgb" /> parameter as cipher text.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgb" /> 参数产生的密码文本形式的加密结果。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this method was `abstract`.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]和.NET framework 的早期版本，此方法已`abstract`。

trans-unit.source: However, the only implementation by a derived class, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.DecryptValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, also threw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 但是，唯一的派生类，实现<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.DecryptValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，还引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>异常。

trans-unit.source: This method call is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此方法调用。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] 开始引发了此异常。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include private parameters; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含专用参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, exports the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，导出 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameters for <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> 的参数。

trans-unit.source: The XML string containing <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> key information.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 密钥信息的 XML 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> object from the key information from an XML string.
trans-unit.target: 通过 XML 字符串中的密钥信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.FromXmlString%2A> initializes an RSA object using key information in an XML string that was generated using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ToXmlString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.FromXmlString%2A>初始化 RSA 对象在使用已生成的 XML 字符串中使用密钥信息<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ToXmlString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.FromXmlString%2A> method accepts either an XML string containing a public key or an XML string containing a public and private key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.FromXmlString%2A>方法接受包含公钥的 XML 字符串或包含公钥和私钥的密钥的 XML 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.FromXmlString%2A> method to conveniently initialize <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> key information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.FromXmlString%2A>方法可方便地初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>密钥信息。

trans-unit.source: Persisting an XML string containing a private key to an insecure location is a security threat.
trans-unit.target: 保留包含私钥到不安全的位置的 XML 字符串是一个安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: The security of your application can be compromised if a malicious third party can access your private key.
trans-unit.target: 如果恶意的第三方可以访问你的私钥，则可能会泄漏你的应用程序的安全性。

trans-unit.source: To safely persist a private key, use a secure key container.
trans-unit.target: 若要安全地保存私钥，请使用安全的密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: For more information about persisting private keys in a key container, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关将私钥存放在密钥容器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 存储非对称密钥存储在密钥容器](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="xmlString" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="xmlString" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the <paramref name="xmlString" /> parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="xmlString" /> 参数的格式无效。

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of binary data.
trans-unit.target: 计算二进制数据的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The binary stream to hash.
trans-unit.target: 要进行哈希处理的二进制流。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, computes the hash value of a specified binary stream by using a specified hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中被重写时，使用指定的哈希算法计算指定的二进制流的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The hashed data.
trans-unit.target: 经过哈希处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 派生方法必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The data to be hashed.
trans-unit.target: 要进行哈希处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first byte in <c>data</c> that is to be hashed.
trans-unit.target: <c>data</c> 中要进行哈希处理的第一个字节的索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to hash.
trans-unit.target: 要进行哈希处理的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm to use in hash the data.
trans-unit.target: 要用于哈希处理数据的算法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, computes the hash value of a specified portion of a byte array by using a specified hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中被重写时，使用指定的哈希算法计算字节数组指定部分的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The hashed data.
trans-unit.target: 经过哈希处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 派生方法必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The parameters for <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 的参数。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, imports the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，导入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key exchange algorithm available with this implementation of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 的这一实现中可用的密钥交换算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns "RSA".
trans-unit.target: 返回“RSA”。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the signature algorithm available with this implementation of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 的这一实现中可用的签名算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns "RSA".
trans-unit.target: 返回“RSA”。

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of the specified data and signs it.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定数据的哈希值，并对其进行签名。

trans-unit.source: The input data for which to compute the hash.
trans-unit.target: 要为其计算哈希的输入数据。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to create the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 要用于创建哈希值的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填充模式。

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of the specified byte array using the specified hash algorithm and padding mode, and signs the resulting hash value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的哈希算法和填充模式计算指定字节的哈希值，并对生产的哈希值进行签名。

trans-unit.source: The RSA signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据的 RSA 签名。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />

trans-unit.source: is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The input stream for which to compute the hash.
trans-unit.target: 要为其计算哈希的输入流。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to create the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 要用于创建哈希值的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填充模式。

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of the specified stream using the specified hash algorithm and padding mode, and signs the resulting hash value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的哈希算法和填充模式计算指定流的哈希值并签名生成的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The RSA signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据的 RSA 签名。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />

trans-unit.source: is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The input data for which to compute the hash.
trans-unit.target: 要为其计算哈希的输入数据。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the array at which to begin using data.
trans-unit.target: 数组中自其开始使用数据的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the array to use as data.
trans-unit.target: 数组中用作数据的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to create the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 要用于创建哈希值的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填充模式。

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of a portion of the specified byte array using the specified hash algorithm and padding mode, and signs the resulting hash value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的哈希算法和填充模式计算指定字节数组部分的哈希值并签名生成的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The RSA signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据的 RSA 签名。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />

trans-unit.source: is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> + <paramref name="count" /> – 1 results in an index that is beyond the upper bound of <paramref name="data" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> + <paramref name="count" /> – 1 会导致超出 <paramref name="data" /> 上限的索引。

trans-unit.source: The hash value of the data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 待签名数据的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm used to create the hash value of the data.
trans-unit.target: 要用于创建数据哈希值的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The padding.
trans-unit.target: 填充。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, computes the signature for the specified hash value by encrypting it with the private key using the specified padding.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，计算指定的哈希值的签名，方法是使用指定填充将其与私钥一起加密。

trans-unit.source: The RSA signature for the specified hash value.
trans-unit.target: 指定哈希值的 RSA 签名。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 派生方法必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include a public and private RSA key; <see langword="false" /> to include only the public key.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示同时包含 RSA 公钥和私钥；<see langword="false" /> 表示仅包含公钥。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an XML string containing the key of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回包含当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 对象的密钥的 XML 字符串。

trans-unit.source: An XML string containing the key of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 对象的密钥的 XML 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ToXmlString%2A> method creates an XML string that contains either the public and private key of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> object or contains only the public key of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ToXmlString%2A>方法创建包含以下任一的 XML 字符串的当前的公共和私有密钥<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>对象或包含仅将公钥当前<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ToXmlString%2A> method whenever you need to conveniently persist RSA key information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ToXmlString%2A>无论何时需要方便地保存 RSA 密钥信息的方法。

trans-unit.source: To initialize an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> object with the key in an XML string, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.FromXmlString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>对象中的 XML 字符串，使用的密钥<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.FromXmlString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Persisting an XML string containing a private key to an insecure location is a security threat.
trans-unit.target: 保留包含私钥到不安全的位置的 XML 字符串是一个安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: The security of your application can be compromised if a malicious third party can access your private key.
trans-unit.target: 如果恶意的第三方可以访问你的私钥，则可能会泄漏你的应用程序的安全性。

trans-unit.source: To safely persist a private key, use a secure key container.
trans-unit.target: 若要安全地保存私钥，请使用安全的密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: For more information about persisting private keys in a key container, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关将私钥存放在密钥容器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 存储非对称密钥存储在密钥容器](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you pass `true` to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ToXmlString%2A> method, the resulting XML string takes the following form:
trans-unit.target: 传递时，`true`到<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ToXmlString%2A>方法，生成的 XML 字符串采用以下形式：

trans-unit.source: When you pass `false` to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ToXmlString%2A> method, the resulting XML string takes the following form:
trans-unit.target: 传递时，`false`到<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ToXmlString%2A>方法，生成的 XML 字符串采用以下形式：

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid.
trans-unit.target: 验证数字签名有效。

trans-unit.source: The signed data.
trans-unit.target: 已签名的数据。

trans-unit.source: The signature data to be verified.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的签名数据。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm used to create the hash value of the data.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建数据哈希值的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填充模式。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid by calculating the hash value of the specified data using the specified hash algorithm and padding, and comparing it to the provided signature.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的哈希算法和填充方式计算指定数据的哈希值，然后将其与提供的签名进行比较来验证数字签名是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果签名有效，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="signature" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="signature" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />

trans-unit.source: is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The signed data.
trans-unit.target: 已签名的数据。

trans-unit.source: The signature data to be verified.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的签名数据。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm used to create the hash value of the data.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建数据哈希值的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填充模式。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid by calculating the hash value of the specified stream using the specified hash algorithm and padding, and comparing it to the provided signature.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的哈希算法和填充方式计算指定流的哈希值，然后将其与提供的签名进行比较来验证数字签名是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果签名有效，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="signature" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="signature" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />

trans-unit.source: is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The signed data.
trans-unit.target: 已签名的数据。

trans-unit.source: The starting index at which to compute the hash.
trans-unit.target: 开始计算哈希的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to hash.
trans-unit.target: 要进行哈希处理的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The signature data to be verified.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的签名数据。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm used to create the hash value of the data.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建数据哈希值的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填充模式。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid by calculating the hash value of the data in a portion of a byte array using the specified hash algorithm and padding, and comparing it to the provided signature.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的哈希算法和填充模式计算字节数组某部分中数据的哈希值，并将其与所提供的签名进行比较，以此验证数字签名是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果签名有效，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="signature" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="signature" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />

trans-unit.source: is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> + <paramref name="count" /> – 1 results in an index that is beyond the upper bound of <paramref name="data" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> + <paramref name="count" /> – 1 会导致超出 <paramref name="data" /> 上限的索引。

trans-unit.source: The hash value of the signed data.
trans-unit.target: 签名数据中的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The signature data to be verified.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的签名数据。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm used to create the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建哈希值的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填充模式。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid by determining the hash value in the signature using the specified hash algorithm and padding, and comparing it to the provided hash value.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的哈希算法和填充方式计算签名中的哈希值，然后将其与提供的哈希值进行比较来验证数字签名是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果签名有效，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 派生类必须重写此方法。
